titles.title: Sunshine in Product Safety Act
A bill to amend the Consumer Product Safety Act to strike provisions that limit the disclosure of certain information by the Consumer Product Safety Commission.
Sunshine in Product Safety Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Sunshine in Product Safety Act
This bill repeals the limitation on the Federal Trade Commission from disclosing information about a consumer product that may reveal the identity of the product's manufacturer without first taking reasonable steps to ensure that the information is accurate and that releasing the information to the public serves the purposes of the laws administered by the commission.
